alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Judith Gap; Musselshell; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 26 at 7:02AM MDT until October 26 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 3 inches. * WHERE...Golden Valley, Judith Gap, Musselshell, and Southern Wheatland. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...The weight of snow on tree limbs may down power lines and could cause sporadic power outages. Plan on slick and hazardous travel conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect accumulating snow to end by early this afternoon.
info.instruction: For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Persons should consider delaying travel. If travel is absolutely necessary, drive with extreme caution. Consider taking a winter storm kit along with you, including such items as tire chains, booster cables, flashlight, shovel, blankets and extra clothing. Also take water, a first aid kit, and anything else that would help you survive in case you become stranded.

area.areaDesc: Golden Valley; Judith Gap; Musselshell; Southern Wheatland
